features: Transcribe Korean speech with Whisper large-v3
Translate to English with Papago API
Generate bilingual SRT (KR top 16pt #A7C1E8, EN bottom 15pt #FFFFFF)
Burn styled subtitles into video using ASS + FFmpeg
Progress feedback and robust error messages in UI
Use Space Secrets for Papago credentials

keyFiles.app.py: Gradio UI, FFmpeg integration, ASS generation, progress, logging
keyFiles.papago_translation.py: PapagoTranslator, timestamp helpers, SRT generation with inline SSA tags

notableConfigs.fonts: NanumGothic installed via packages.txt to avoid tofu squares
notableConfigs.subtitleStyle: KR 16pt #A7C1E8 top; EN 15pt #FFFFFF bottom; \N between lines; blank line between segments

risks: Font discovery issues if fonts not installed
Large Whisper model memory/CPU usage on Space
